title: Hyundai's sales dip 3% in July to 64,563 units
description: Hyundai Motor India reported a 3% year-on-year decline in wholesales to 64,563 units in July. Domestic dispatches dropped 3.3% to 49,013 units, while exports decreased by 2.81% to 15,550 units.
